anya-e0301n11:30_31: sattakkhattuparamocāti tīhi guṇitā cha. Puna catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā catuvīsati
anya-e0301n11:30_32: honti. Tividha vimokkhacatupaṭipadānaṁ pana bhedena dvādasa sakadāgāmino dvādasa
anya-e0301n11:30_33: arahantoca honti. Anāgāmino pana avihesu tāva tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahacca
anya-e0301n11:30_34: parinibbāyī, eko uddhaṁ soto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca. Teyeva sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
anya-e0301n11:30_35: asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīcāti dvīhi guṇitā dasa. Tathā atappasu dassasudassīsu ticattālīsa
anya-e0301n11:30_36: honti. Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīnāma natthīti cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino
anya-e0301n11:30_37: cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti aṭṭhāti. Sabbe aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_38: pana dvādasa sotāpannā, dvādasa sakadāgāmino, catuvīsati anāgāmino, dve arahanto,
anya-e0301n11:30_39: cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa honti. Teyeva saddhādhura paññādhura vasena dvīhi
anya-e0301n11:30_40: guṇitā aṭṭhasataṁ puggalā hontīti āgato. Etthāti etasmiṁ puggalabhede. Sabbesaṁpīti
anya-e0301n11:30_41: catunnaṁ phalaṭṭhānaṁpi sādhāraṇāva. Na nirodhasamāpatti viya ekaccānaṁeva sādhāraṇāti
anya-e0301n11:30_42: adhippāyo. Ativiya mamāyitassa abhinindi tassa ajjhositassa attano cittasantānassa
anya-e0301n11:30_43: apavattikaraṇaṁ nāma bahalarāgavimuttānaṁeva sijjhatīti vuttaṁ, anāgāmīnañceva arahantānañcalabbhatīti.
anya-e0301n11:30_44: Tesaṁpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṁ kāmarūpabhavagatānaññeva idha gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n11:30_45: Kasmā, ādito paṭṭhāya anupubbanirodhabaleneva gantabbattā. Tenāha tatthātiādi. Tatrāyaṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_46: vidhi, pathamajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato
anya-e0301n11:30_47: anattato vipassati. Tato dutīyajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre
anya-e0301n11:30_48: tatheva vipassati. Tato tatīyaṁ jhānaṁ. Tato catutthaṁ jhānaṁ. Tato pañcamaṁ jhānaṁ.
anya-e0301n11:30_49: Tato ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ. Tato viññāṇañcā yatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate
anya-e0301n11:30_50: saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Tato ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhaavikopanaṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_51: saṅghapatimānanaṁ satthupakkosanaṁ addhāna paricchedoti imaṁ catubbidhaṁ pubbakiccaṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_52: karoti. Tato nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjati. Ekaṁvā dvevā cittavāre atikkamitvā
anya-e0301n11:30_53: acittako hoti nirodhaṁ phusatīti. Tatthatatthevāti tato tato jhānato tasmiṁ tasmiṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_54: vuṭṭhitakāleeva. Vipassantoti nirodhassa samatha vipassanā yuganandhabaleneva pattabbattā
anya-e0301n11:30_55: vipassanābalenapi cittasantānassa saṇhasukhumabhāvā pādanatthaṁ idaṁ pathamajjhānaṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_56: aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanto. Yāvaākiñcaññāyatanaṁgantvāti yāva ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṁ,
anya-e0301n11:30_58: icchitabbāniyeva. Teneva hi paṭisambhidāmagge pañcavidhā vasiyo nirodhaparikammesu
anya-e0301n11:30_60: adhiṭṭheyyaṁ. Attano sarīrābandhe parikkhāre thapetvā nānābandhāni civarādīni parikkhārāni
anya-e0301n11:30_61: aggiādinā parissayena māvinassantūtivā, ekasīmāyaṁ saṅghakamme karīyamāne saṅgho
anya-e0301n11:30_62: maṁ pabhimānessati, tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā, satthā maṁ kenacikāraṇena pakkosā pessati,
anya-e0301n11:30_63: tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṁ. Ādisaddena nirodhabbhantareeva maraṇaṁ nukho
anya-e0301n11:30_64: me bhavissatīti evaṁ pavatto addhāna paricchedo gahito. Dvinnaṁ.La. Vocchijjaticittasantati
anya-e0301n11:30_65: tadatthāya ādito paṭṭhāya tathārūpassa payogavisesassa suṭṭhu katattā. Tatoti tasmiṁ
anya-e0301n11:30_66: kāle. Anāgāmino anāgāmi phalacittaṁ nirāvajjanaṁpi nipparikammaṁpīti adhippāyo. Tathāhi
anya-e0301n11:30_67: ādito paṭṭhāya punappunaṁ pavattitaṁ vipassanāparikammameva tassa parikammaṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n11:30_68: tiṭṭhati. Na visuṁ āsannaparikammaṁ nāma atthīti. Paccavekkhananti phalapaccavekkhanaṁ.
anya-e0301n11:30_69: Evaṁ duvidhaṁ kammaṭṭhānanayaṁ niddisitvā idāni yadatthaṁ so niddisīyati, tadatthe
anya-e0301n11:30_70: sotujane niyojento bhāve tabbanti gāthamāha. Tattha paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipatti. Paṭipajjantivā
anya-e0301n11:30_71: etāya uparupari visesanti paṭipatti. Sīlādidhammo. Rasīyati nirāmisasukhānubhavanavasena
anya-e0301n11:30_72: anubhavīyatīti raso. Jhānamagga phalabhūto adhigamadhammo. Arahatta phalamevavā.
anya-e0301n11:30_73: Tadubhayaṁ paṭicca uppannapītisomanassamevavā. Paṭipattiyā raso paṭipatti raso. Soeva
anya-e0301n11:30_74: assāditabbaṭṭhena assādo cāti paṭipatti rasassādo. Sāsane paṭipattirasassādaṁ patthayantena
anya-e0301n11:30_75: bhikkhunā iccevaṁ mayā niddiṭṭhaṁ uttamaṁ bhāvanādvayaṁ bhāvetabbanti sambandho.
